text: Would anyone be willing to check some changes I made to a non-native english speakers doc's to improve readability before I submit a PR. The last thing I want is to have made changes that tarnish readability. I didn't fix every mistake because I want the authors words to still be intact. Any assistance appreciated: <https://github.com/caseykneale/MLStyle.jl>

text:
Had a quick look. Looks good!  (But I am a non-native English speaker myself though!)

realworld -> real-world

But why you say “non-native English speakers”, you sure? It could be that native English speakers wrote the original, no? (I guess you know the people...) :)
